start.text: Hey there, friend! Looking for some fish? Or maybe you've got a good catch to sell?

choices.text: Fishing is a waste of time.
I've got some fish for you.

neutral_response.text: No worries. Let me know if you change your mind. The fish are always biting.

hostile_response.text: A waste of time? Hmph. Some people just don't appreciate the simple things. Good day to you.

positive_response.text: That's what I like to hear! Let's see what you've got.
